Description: Pratesi Womens Italian Leather Alberti Ladies Large Handbag Purse in Coffee Sleek and stylish, the perfect bag for business as it can easily"carry your iPad, but also perfect for evening and everyday use. The Alberti Radica Range Collection leather tote bag has a polished and smooth finish, a traditional technique used by Pratesi. The leather short top handles are double rolled for comfort and has a top opening with"button closure. The inside is plain lined and has a"central dividing zip pocket,"two side pouches"and"two pen holders. Four metal feet bottom to protect your bag and to add to its flexibility it comes with an"easily attachable shoulder strap. From the Radica Range Collection, this product is handmade in the Florence region of Italy, tanned with a special technique that uses only natural ingredients and pigmented with a lacquer to achieve the patent leather with coats the leather for protection and gives a smooth, clean and glossy finish. Beautiful Brass & Stainless Steel Hardware with Superior Stitching and Lining finish. This classic leather day bag features 3 internal sections, the central closed with a zipper, a lateral large zippered pocket, two pen holders, cell phone holder and one small open pocket. Double Compartment. Detachable Shoulder Strap Dimensions: 15.75" (L) x 12.2" (H) x 4" (W). Weight: 3 lbs. Return Policy We accept returns and exchanges within 30 days of your order date.
